page.title: 09Richard's Day.
page.content: My name is Richard Wood and every school day I get up at eight o'clock. I go for a wash and get dressed. For breakfast I have cereal. Between 20 and half past 8 my friend Lee comes for me. We walk to school. We arrive about 20 minutes before 9 o'clock. We usually play Bulldog or walk around. At 9 o'clock we go in and line up for Assembly. When we return we have Maths. At 10.35 we have a break. We have a tuck shop. After break we have English. At 12.00 it's dinner time. We have an hour and a quarter. After dinner play we have Topic. At 2.25 we have playtime. Next we have Reading and reading sheets. At 3.45 we leave. When I get home I watch T.V. till tea. Later I go out with my friend Sean who lives near me. We play football and go for bike rides. I go to bed at 9.30.
